long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Test Companion Browser Plugin is an essential tool for capturing user interactions on any webpage, transforming them into clear, actionable steps. Perfect for testers and developers, this plugin records clicks, inputs, and navigations, along with screenshots and page URLs, and sends this data directly to the Test Companion app. Each recorded session creates a comprehensive, visual log of user interactions, making it easy to generate test cases, automated scripts, and bug reports.

With Test Companion, documenting and analyzing user behavior has never been easier!
